content: पुच्छः --च्छं {@--1@} A tail in general; पश्चात्पच्छं वहति विपुलं <ls>U. 4. 27.</ls> {@--2@} A hairy tail. {@--3@} A peacock's tail {@--4@} The hinder part. {@--5@} The end of anything.
